paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant p.V142I, including penetrance data and patient demographics.

patients.demographics: 623 from UK and 256 from France; specific age and sex not detailed

functional_data.summary: The study indicates that the p.V142I variant is associated with ATTR-CM.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families as it is a known pathogenic variant.
variants.additional_notes: The study focuses on patients with NAC ATTR Stage I, including those with the p.V142I variant.
key_quotes: A retrospective multi-centre observational study of 879 patients with ATTR-CM, either wild-type TTR genotype or carrying the p.V142I TTR variant.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the TTR variant.
